actor-start.eventDescription: Initial fee for starting the MCP Server Actor

searchPubmedKeywords.eventDescription: Fee for searching PubMed articles by keywords.

searchPubmedAdvanced.eventDescription: Fee for advanced search on PubMed articles.

getPubmedArticleMetadata.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving metadata for a PubMed article.

downloadPubmedPdf.eventDescription: Fee for downloading a PubMed article PDF.

deepPaperAnalysis.eventDescription: Fee for running deep analysis on a PubMed paper.
